author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Puducherry unit of Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) on Thursday criticised the government for the lack of maintenance of Thiruvalluvar statue at Chunnambar boathouse, Nonankuppam near Cuddalore Road.

In a statement, V. Saminathan, State general secretary of BJP (Puducherry) demanded the government to take appropriate steps to maintain the statue of the world-renowned Tamil poet and philosopher Thiruvalluvar before January 16.

“Besides, government functions should also be organised in this place.

To reach the younger generations, special classes need to be organised,” he added.
title: Maintain Thiruvalluvar statue: BJP
